ThingDef.label: scented candle
ThingDef.description:
These handmade candles use butter as a base, stabilized with other natural ingredients, and infused with rich botanical essences. The result is a fragrant, slow-burning candle with a smooth, clean melt that fills the room with soothing scents.

<color=#E5E54C>Trade considerations:</color>

<color=#E5E54C>Ingredients:</color> Making 20 scented candle requires essence and butter for a total value of 230, and sells for 32, giving a <color=#33CC33>64.06%</color> profit per unit.

<color=#E5E54C>Value per work:</color> Recipe requires 10000 work, which results on a value per work of <color=#33CC33>0.06</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Caravan trading:</color> Its weight is 0.1 Kg, for a value per Kg of <color=#33CC33>320</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Profit per day:</color> On average, profit per day is <color=#33CC33>2.41</color> (for reference Yayo is 0.35).
